thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: peter G
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by peter G

author: peter G
title: peter G
text:
Good prices,, easy to get a Quote: online, but the fields throughout some of the name and address steps you need to fill in are dysfunctional.
Fortunately we can call our local Miami Gold Coast franchise for help. 5 Stars to them. But really the IT staff responsible at Pack & Send should be replaced. I've rang them,,,they seem to have given up. 2 stars to them.
A tip, when all your details entered are shown before you click pay, and you need to edit something, scroll back up the page with your mouse where you can edit any of the 5 steps your've completed. If you click the edit button at the bottom (the only one visible if you do not scroll up), you will lose everything you have entered.
